entry.title: What do San Diego in California and São Carlos in Brazil have in common ?
entry.summary:
(Originally published in LinkedIn on March 14, 2020)

I had the opportunity to attend the ignite conference at UC San Diego - California last year. I was amazed by how many similarities I could find between San Diego, (where I was a Visiting PhD stude...
